languages.text: [Обратиться к пиратам] "Кто первый принесет мне голову Саргоны, получит помилование и место на моем флагмане!"
[Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к пиратам] "Кто первый принесет мне голову Саргоны, получит помилование и место на моем флагмане!"

traits.locale_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"
[Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

[Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los piratas] «¡Quien me traiga la cabeza de Sargona recibirá un indulto y un puesto en la tripulación de mi nave insignia!».
languages.original_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los piratas] «¡Quien me traiga la cabeza de Sargona recibirá un indulto y un puesto en la tripulación de mi nave insignia!».

languages.text: [对所有海盗开口]“谁能把萨戈纳的脑袋给我，谁就能得到赦免，还可以到我的旗舰上来！”
languages.original_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

traits.locale_text: [对所有海盗开口]“谁能把萨戈纳的脑袋给我，谁就能得到赦免，还可以到我的旗舰上来！”

languages.text: [Interpeller les pirates] « Quiconque m'apportera la tête de Sargona se verra offrir le pardon, ainsi qu'un poste à bord de mon vaisseau amiral ! »
languages.original_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

traits.locale_text: [Interpeller les pirates] « Quiconque m'apportera la tête de Sargona se verra offrir le pardon, ainsi qu'un poste à bord de mon vaisseau amiral ! »

languages.text: [海賊に話しかける]「サルゴナの首を{mf|俺|私}のところに持ってきたやつには、恩赦と旗艦のクルーの立場をくれてやる！」
languages.original_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

traits.locale_text: [海賊に話しかける]「サルゴナの首を{mf|俺|私}のところに持ってきたやつには、恩赦と旗艦のクルーの立場をくれてやる！」

languages.text: [Korsanlara seslen] "Sargona'nın kellesini her kim getirirse affedilecek ve sancak gemimde kendine bir yer bulacak!"
languages.original_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

traits.locale_text: [Korsanlara seslen] "Sargona'nın kellesini her kim getirirse affedilecek ve sancak gemimde kendine bir yer bulacak!"

languages.text: [Die Piraten ansprechen] "Wer mir Sargons Kopf bringt, wird begnadigt und in die Besatzung meines Flaggschiffs aufgenommen!"
languages.original_text: [Address the pirates] "Whoever brings me Sargona's head will receive a pardon and a spot on my flagship's crew!"

traits.locale_text: [Die Piraten ansprechen] "Wer mir Sargons Kopf bringt, wird begnadigt und in die Besatzung meines Flaggschiffs aufgenommen!"
